means: 想像，展望( envision的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The use of capital goods is envisioned for the future.
sentence.Network_cn: 资本货物的应用着眼于未来.

sentence.Network_en: Alexander envisioned a cosmopolitan culture in his new empire.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚历山大打算让他的新帝国具有世界性的文化.

sentence.Network_en: The first core memory was envisioned in 1948.
sentence.Network_cn: 在1948年第一个磁芯存贮器问世.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Dalí , though not a true paranoid , was able to simulate a paranoid state , without the use of drugs , and upon his return to " normal perspective " he would paint what he saw and envisioned therein .达利虽然不是真正的偏执狂，但却能够不靠药物的作用模拟偏执狂的状态，一旦回到“正常的视角”，他就能画出在偏执状态
In his mind , he envisioned a young shepherd boy ., 他的脑海中浮现出一个年轻牧童的形象.

repeatedly reuate your open positions . keep asking yourself : would I put my money into this if it were presented to me for the first time today ? is this trade progressing toward the ending position I envisioned ?反复地重新衡量你的持仓头寸。不断地问自己：如果这是我今天第一次才看到的，我会投钱
Few would have envisioned how quickly and extensively this would happen ., 但很少有人预想到这种情况会发生得如此迅速 , 此广泛.

list.abs: Joe , when you envision the fight taking place , do you envision knocking out Lacy ?乔，当你预想这次比赛进行时，你预想要击倒莱西吗？
近日，微软在其刚刚开张的展示中心（Envisioning Center）进行了一场媒体发布会，邀请了为数不多的几位记者展示他们的最新技术…
微软新的创意中心(Envisioning Center)当天面向公众开放，同时它还发布了一段名为“微软未来愿景：生活、工作和娱乐”(Microsoft's F…
Train the envision ability of the students , and innovation ability , transpire their thoughts ., 培养学生的想象能力 , 创新能力 , 发散性思维.
企业的愿景包括两个部分，一个是企业的核心信仰 (core ideology)与未来景象(envisioned future)。前者包括企业的核心价值观和核心使.

entry.def: If you envision something, you envisage it.

example.ex: In the future we envision a federation of companies...
example.tran: 我们设想将来会成立一个公司联盟。

example.ex: Most people do stop at this point, not envisioning that there is anything beyond.
example.tran: 大多数人确实都在这里停下，想象不到在这之外还会有些什么。

means.word_mean: 1. seen in the mind as a mental image;

sentences.sentence: "the snow-covered Alps pictured in her imagination"
"the visualized scene lacked the ugly details of real life"

auth_sentence.content: They were hardly the successors St Peter had envisioned.
auth_sentence.res_content: They were hardly the successors St Peter had envisioned.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They were hardly the successors St Peter had envisioned.

auth_sentence.content: The envisioned system combines stationary devices with mobile sensors.
auth_sentence.res_content: The envisioned system combines stationary devices with mobile sensors.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The envisioned system combines stationary devices with mobile sensors.

auth_sentence.content: On Monday, it worked exactly as Collins envisioned.
